Package gr.interamerican.bo2.creation.update

Class Summary
AbstractClassUpdater Abstract base class for class a updater.
AddingCodeToDefaultConstructorClassUpdater Updates a type by adding code at the end of its default constructor.
AddingFieldsClassUpdater Updates a type by adding fields to it.
AddingInterfacesClassUpdater Updates a type by adding fields to it.
AddingMethodsClassUpdater Updates a type by adding methods.
ClassCompiler ClassCompiler creates a new class and then enhances it in multiple steps by applying the updates done by an array of AbstractClassUpdater.
MakingConcreteClassUpdater Makes a class concrete by removing its abstract modifier.
MultipleClassUpdater MultipleClassUpdater does the changes that would be done by an array of AbstractClassUpdater in one step.
SettingDefaultConstructorClassUpdater Updates a type by adding code at the end of its default constructor.
SettingSuperTypeClassUpdater Updates a type by setting its super type.
